name: Naitik Rajyaguru
title: Software Developer
description: Results-driven Software Developer with hands-on experience in building scalable web applications, AI-driven internal tools, and real-time collaborative platforms. Proficient in both frontend and backend development with additional exposure to automation, NLP, and system optimization. Adept at leveraging emerging technologies to solve real-world problems efficiently while delivering high-quality solutions.

education.description: Completed undergraduate studies with a solid academic record and practical exposure to real-world projects in software development.

projects.title: Automated News Updater
projects.description: Developed a Python-based web scraping tool to extract and format daily news headlines from multiple websites. Designed a GUI for user registration with email and implemented an automated mailing system to send news summaries to registered users daily.

projects.title: Real-time Collaborative Editor and Chat Platform
projects.description: Built a socket-based multi-user chat application with real-time document collaboration functionality similar to Google Docs. Enabled simultaneous editing and communication among multiple users in shared spaces.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: Implemented a content-based movie recommendation system using similarity metrics and NLP-driven user reviews. Developed a Streamlit-based Python interface to provide interactive movie suggestions.

projects.title: Flappy Bird Game (Basic)
projects.description: Created a simple version of the Flappy Bird game using Unity and C#, focusing on game logic, character motion, and interactive gameplay elements.

internship.description: Developed a full stack job profiling platform using Angular, .NET, and MySQL. Enabled users to create profiles and register within the company portal efficiently.
Engineered an automated QA testing system to schedule and execute test cases at predefined intervals, generating detailed test execution reports to streamline the QA process.

fulltime.description:
Led the development of multiple AI-driven internal tools that reduced organizational costs by approximately 60% using semantic caching and prompt caching strategies. Delivered key projects including:
- A RAG-based chatbot for internal query handling.
- An advanced SQL validator capable of detecting critical optimization rules to improve stored procedure and query performance by 70-80%.
- An accessibility compliance assistant following WCAG standards for validating web content, images, text, and code blocks.
- An adaptive system that personalizes user experiences based on system inputs.

Built a CI/CD pipeline using Liquibase to automate SQL deployment and generate validation reports at push-time. Utilized Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MongoDB, SQL, Pinecone, FAISS, and Liquibase, deployed on internal virtual machines.

Developed secure authentication microservices supporting both OAuth2 (two-token sliding window-based expiry system) and LDAP-based authentication for internal organizational tools. Provided seamless session management and integration with the organization's Active Directory.

fulltime.projectTitle: Content Simplification and Audio Generation Tool
fulltime.description: Built a dynamic content simplification tool that adjusts text complexity based on age groups and generates real-time audio with word-level highlighting. Integrated multi-language support and contextual simplification features to make complex topics accessible to diverse user groups.

Worked on a live client Learning Management System (LMS) project based on PHP. Resolved critical SonarQube issues, optimized stored procedures and APIs, and successfully reduced query execution time by 80%, improving overall system responsiveness and efficiency.
